Question: This person signed the Immigration Reform and Control Act in 1986.
Hints: In 1985, this person visited a German military cemetery in Bitburg to lay a wreath with West German Chancellor Helmut Kohl.
This person was involved in high-profile conflicts with the protest movements of the era.
This person performed 77 rescues as a lifeguard, noting that he notched a mark on a wooden log for every life he saved.
